resources.string: GPS is disabled in your device. Enable it?
You have disabled Location Services on your device. We need your location to determine the position of your friends relative to your\'s
You don\'t have required sensors on your device. We need them to determine your location accurately.
Something went wrong, Please try again later.

How to use\?

1.Open the app and choose between sun or moon.

2.a) If green mark displaying Altitude is above 0 degrees, point your device upwards towards sky.

2.b) If green mark displaying Altitude is below 0 degrees, point your device downwards towards floor.

3.Move your device from left to right until direction arrows disappear.

4.Adjust the curser to match the green mark, until container appears.

5.Once the container has appeared and matched the right Azimuth and Altitude, it will display 'Located!' message on screen.

6. You have successfully located Sun/Moon on sky.
You must enable location services to send your location updates to our server.
